meta.description: Don't miss our free email newsletter! http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Neil Miller has spent decades researching countless vaccine studies that are available to everyone. Here, he breaks down the recent history of the use and removal of mercury in vaccines. Find out what really happened to mercury in the vaccines and why!

title: What You Should Know About Mercury and Vaccines!
cleaned_text: Neil Miller has spent decades researching countless vaccine studies that are available to everyone. Here, he breaks down the recent history of the use and removal of mercury in vaccines. Find out what really happened to mercury in the vaccines and why!
